hymn.title: If You Want a Great Big Smile
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

layout.singingstanza: If you want a great big smile Give one, give one. If you want to have a friend, You bet -- ter be one, too. What you wish for you, That to oth -- ers do. If you think of oth -- ers first, They'll do the same for you.

lyrics.stanza: If you want a great big smile Give one, give one. If you want to have a friend, You better be one, too. What you wish for you, That to others do. If you think of others first, They'll do the same for you.
